name: projb-server
description: Server with TypeScript, JavaScript, C++/Rust native modules, and runtime dependencies

scripts.preinstall: python3 -c "import distutils" 2>/dev/null || python3 -m ensurepip --upgrade && python3 -m pip install --upgrade setuptools
scripts.build:native: npm run build:cpp && npm run build:rust
scripts.build:cpp: export HOME=/vercel && cd native/cpp-addon && npm install && npm run rebuild
scripts.build:rust: cd native/rust-validator/src && cargo build --release && cp $(find target/release -maxdepth 1 -name '*.node' | head -n 1) .
scripts.build: npm run install:rust && npm run build:native && npm run build:ts
